txt.en: The plaque moved inward, activating some mechanism in the old fountain

You find a strange plaque in Máttugard. It says:

'The Moon will light the way under the Three Peaks.'

Perhaps there is some special mirror or mirrors that need to shine upon the plaque?
The plaque moved inward, activating some mechanism in the old fountain
DNT

Returning to the Plaque of the Moon, you press the plaque and it too moves inward, shooting a beam of moon-light into the chamber of Máttugard. Additional text on the plaque reveals itself.\n\n'Let the Moon be a beacon of remembrance for all those who sit on the Throne of Gundabad. Without the Sun, the Lord, there would be no Moon, no People. Without the Moon, there would be no Sun. This is the way of the Dwarves.'
A lit moon mirror must be somewhere in Máttugard.\n\nYou should locate the lit moon mirror.
The Plaque of the Moon can be found in Máttugard.\n\nYou should return to the Plaque of the Moon.
A lit moon mirror must be somewhere in Máttugard.\n\nYou should reposition the lit moon mirror.
Reposition a third moon mirror

A first plaque must be somewhere in Máttugard.

You should find the first plaque.

'By night, the moon reflects in my waters.
'The nobles walk by at all hours.
'Each day, you converse around me.'
Locate the lit moon mirror
Another moon mirror must be somewhere else in Máttugard.\n\nYou should reposition a second moon mirror.
Return to the Plaque of the Moon

A second plaque must be somewhere in Máttugard.

You should find the second plaque.

'By night, the moon reflects in my waters.
'The nobles walk by at all hours.
'Each day, you converse around me.'
Reposition the lit moon mirror
Another moon mirror must be somewhere else in Máttugard.\n\nYou should reposition a third moon mirror.
Find the first plaque

Returning to the Plaque of the Moon, the light reveals more text upon the plaque:

'The words will strengthen all under the Three Peaks:
'By night, the moon reflects in my waters.
'The nobles walk by at all hours.
'Each day, you converse around me.'

Perhaps there is some sort of other plaque or plaques that need to be found in Máttugard?
Within the Great Court of Máttugard lies the strange Plaque of the Moon.
Reposition a second moon mirror
Find the second plaque

A third plaque must be somewhere in Máttugard.

You should find the third plaque.

'By night, the moon reflects in my waters.
'The nobles walk by at all hours.
'Each day, you converse around me.'
The moon mirror locks into place, pointing towards the Plaque of the Moon
You have located a moon mirror that has been lit
The Plaque of the Moon can be found in Máttugard.\n\nYou should return to the Plaque of the Moon.
The light reveals a riddle upon the plaque
Find the third plaque
The moon mirror locks into place, pointing towards Shalakibal
The plaque moved inward, activating some mechanism in the old fountain
Return to the Plaque of the Moon
The moon mirror locks into place, pointing towards Vâr Nuchur
Puzzle of the Moon
